name: Food From a Stranger
description:
Food From a Stranger

A short VN about a creepy stranger that tries to give this innocent girl some candy.

Liked the game?

Then please consider supporting it - it's free to do so! Learn how to support me as a creator here!

Also, please DM me on Twitter @InteractiveSto3 if you find any bugs! I would really appreciate that!

Art:

  • Character sprites by fuelli
  • Background by Game Dev Assets
